Unarmed.Description: Mastery of the martial arts. Not especially damaging, but with great controlling and stunning abilities. Generally requires one or both hands to be empty, although you can use kicks even with other items wielded.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Unarmed, gain favor with Furlak in the Winter Nexus.

Mycology.Description: Mastery of fungus in all its forms.

Sword.Description: Expertise with swords, rapiers, and the like. Swords are very damaging, and can reduce an opponent's Rage.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Sword, gain favor with Janet Lews in Kur Mountains.

Mining.Description: Digging metals and ores out of the ground.

MushroomFarming.Name: Mushroom Farming
MushroomFarming.Description: The specialized art of growing mushrooms in special grow-boxes.

Gardening.Description: Growing things in a garden: herbs, food, and flowers.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Gardening, gain favor with Kelim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.

Cooking.Description: Skill in preparing food for consumption.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Cooking, gain favor with Selaxi in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.

FireMagic.Name: Fire Magic
FireMagic.Description: Using Fire to destroy your enemies. This is a very potent offensive skill, including long-range and area-effect attacks, and even some Cold attacks for versatility. However, there are drawbacks: Fire Magic is extremely Power-intensive; all creatures generate extra Rage when they are burned; and many creatures have some resistance to fire.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Fire Magic, gain favor with The Sand Seer in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.

30.Notes: Access to new research recipe

Gourmand.Description:
The art of appreciating what you eat. A high gourmand skill allows you to get more benefits from fancier foods.

Each food has a Gourmet Level, which caps your benefits from this skill. If you eat a food with a Gourmet Level lower than your Gourmand skill, you will get benefits as if your skill was the food's Gourmet Level.

5.Notes:
+1 Max Health from health-raising food
+1 Health from instant-heal food

Werewolf.Name: Lycanthropy
Werewolf.Description: Skill in fighting as a wolf beast. Also indicates your ability to control and suppress the beast mode.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Lycanthropy, seek out the Altar of Norala during a full moon.

BeastSpeech.Name: Beast Speech
BeastSpeech.Description: Skill in speaking while in the form of an animal or monstrous beast. (You earn XP in Beast Speech by speaking aloud. You can't earn XP more than once per minute.)

Howling.Description: Skill in howling as a werewolf.

WerewolfMetabolism.Name: Beast Metabolism
WerewolfMetabolism.Description: Represents your metabolic efficiency when consuming raw meats.

Anatomy.Name: Anatomy
Anatomy.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of creatures in general. This is an umbrella skill that encompasses a vast suite of sub-skills for particular types of creatures. This skill represents generalized knowledge that applies to all creatures in the world.

Pathology.Name: Pathology
Pathology.Description: Skill in figuring out how someone or something died. Higher skill allows more details to be determined and more difficult organisms to be examined.

ArtHistory.Name: Art History
ArtHistory.Description: Understanding of the rich history of art in Alharth. This skill can help you identify valuable artwork, but more importantly, it helps you to be a well-rounded individual.

PoetryAppreciation.Name: Poetry Appreciation
PoetryAppreciation.Description: Skill in finding the meaning of poems, especially difficult and tedious ones.

GenderStudies.Name: Gender Studies
GenderStudies.Description: A careful exploration of gender roles and sexuality, focusing on Human, Elven, and Raksasha cultures. This knowledge is not directly applicable to combat or crafting, but it helps you to be a well-rounded individual.

Autodidacticism.Name: Autodidacticism
Autodidacticism.Description: The ability to learn new skills on your own, just from reading a book.

Calligraphy.Name: Calligraphy
Calligraphy.Description: The art of writing things. Handy for... writing things. It's also a valuable art for swordsmen and other warriors, who can infuse their art with potent additional effects.

FirstAid.Name: First Aid
FirstAid.Description: The ability to use first aid kits to heal yourself or others.

ArmorPatching.Name: Armor Patching
ArmorPatching.Description: The ability to use repair kits to fix up your armor.

Carpentry.Name: Carpentry
Carpentry.Description: Preparing and treating lumber, and making things out of wood.

Psychology.Name: Psychology
Psychology.Description: Understanding the mind of sentient creatures. Also, using that knowledge in combat and other stressful situations.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Psychology, gain favor with Nissim in Amulna, a town in the Ilmari Desert.

Myconic.Description: Knowledge of the secret language of ancient fungus creatures.

Foraging.Description: The art of picking things up. Except mushrooms, those are special for some reason. Experts at Foraging are also experts at tracking down stationary items and locations (such as many Quest Objectives).

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Foraging, gain favor with Jesina the Fairy in Eltibule.

Pig.Description: The art of living and fighting as a pig.

Deer.Description: The art of living and fighting as a deer.

Cow.Description: The art of living and fighting as a cow.

Meditation.Description:
Skill in centering yourself and creating inner focus. This is especially helpful when using Unarmed combat skill.

To meditate, you must be near a Meditation Pillar. Each meditation also requires a simple focus item, such as a fruit or flower.

Alchemy.Description: The art of combining esoteric things together to make potions and poisons.

AnimalHandling.Name: Animal Handling
AnimalHandling.Description: The art of taming animals and teaching them to fight alongside you.

BattleChemistry.Name: Battle Chemistry
BattleChemistry.Description: Using alchemical concoctions in the heat of battle. Not for the faint of heart, or the particularly sane, this combat style specializes in area-effects of all types. Advanced practitioners can also ingest their formulae directly to take on new combat personalities. Masters can even create homonculi to serve them in battle.

2.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Mycology)

3.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Fishing)

4.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in First Aid)

48.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Pathology)

49.Notes: Access to new cross-discipline chemical concoction (in Lore)

Staff.Description: Mastery of the staff as a martial weapon. Staff fighting has a mix of both offensive and defensive abilities.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Staff, gain favor with Roshun The Traitor outside of Serbule.

Necromancy.Description: Necromancy is control over the undead, along with other powers that trifle with mortality. To use necromantic abilities, you must be wielding or wearing a necromancy gem. You can often find these on weapons, and less often on pieces of armor. (If you are in a beast form, necromancy gems in weapons won't work, but ones in armor will.)

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Necromancy, gain favor with Daniel Murderdark in Amulna.

Skinning.Description: Skill in the act of removing fur or skin from an animal. You need to be carrying a Skinning Knife in order to skin a corpse. Corpses of sentient creatures, such as goblins and humans, can't be skinned.

Tanning.Description: The craft of turning disgusting animal skins, furs, and hides into leather, fleece, and other material ready to be used in clothing and armor.

Mentalism.Name: Mentalism
Mentalism.Description: The power of mind over matter: psychic powers! This combat skill focuses on recovery and restoration, but it also has multiple damaging abilities.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Mentalism, gain favor with Rohina in Sun Vale.

Anatomy_Elves.Name: Elven Anatomy
Anatomy_Elves.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of elves.

Anatomy_Rakshasa.Name: Rakshasa Anatomy
Anatomy_Rakshasa.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of rakshasa.

Anatomy_Canines.Name: Canine Anatomy
Anatomy_Canines.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of dogs, wolves, and werewolves. Gives bonuses to killing, skinning, and raising these creatures.

Anatomy_Goblins.Name: Goblin Anatomy
Anatomy_Goblins.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of goblins.

Anatomy_Fey.Name: Fey Anatomy
Anatomy_Fey.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of faeries and fey creatures, including some animals that look mundane but aren't, such as the fey panther.

Anatomy_Orcs.Name: Orc Anatomy
Anatomy_Orcs.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of orcs.

Anatomy_Giants.Name: Giant Anatomy
Anatomy_Giants.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of giant-kin such as yetis and ogres.

Anatomy_Aberrations.Name: Aberration Anatomy
Anatomy_Aberrations.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of creatures made by mad science or dark chemistry.

Anatomy_Elementals.Name: Elemental Anatomy
Anatomy_Elementals.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of elementals.

Anatomy_Constructs.Name: Construct Anatomy
Anatomy_Constructs.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of constructs such as golems.

Anatomy_Fish.Name: Fish and Snail Anatomy
Anatomy_Fish.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of fish. Also snails. They're very similar. Really.

Anatomy_Dinosaurs.Name: Dinosaur Anatomy

Teleportation.Description: The magical art of suddenly being somewhere else.

Archery.Description: Expertise with using bows to hunt and kill.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Archery, gain favor with Alravesa the All-Hunter in Rahu.

Fletching.Description: The craft of arrow-making. Most fletching recipes require elements obtained from Carpentry, so it's often handy to know both skills well. At higher level, fletchers also need various Alchemy components.

10.Notes: Can now maintain two Fletching Boxes at once

20.Notes: Can now maintain three Fletching Boxes at once

30.Notes: Can now maintain four Fletching Boxes at once

40.Notes: Can now maintain five Fletching Boxes at once

50.Notes: Can now maintain six Fletching Boxes at once

Leatherworking.Description: Turning leathers into armor and goods.

SigilScripting.Name: Sigil Scripting
SigilScripting.Description: Using magical inks and arcane rituals to create areas of power.

Spider.Description: The art of living and fighting as a spider.

Endurance.Name: Endurance
Endurance.Description:
The ability to endure heavy loads and uncomfortable situations without getting tired. Your Endurance increases the speed of your armor regeneration between fights, among other things.

(The most common way to raise Endurance is simply to take armor damage in combat.)

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Endurance, gain favor with Lamashu in Kur Mountains.

Blacksmithing.Name: Blacksmithing
Blacksmithing.Description: Making and enhancing metal equipment. Blacksmiths don't create armor directly, but they can buttress metal armor's effectiveness. They also create metal parts for many other skills.

Surveying.Name: Surveying
Surveying.Description: Analyzing the land to locate valuable resources or important locations. Surveying has many uses, but is most commonly used to make resource maps for Geology and Mining.

Geology.Description: Digging crystals out of the ground, and knowing what they do.

Notoriety.Description: A measure of your renown. You earn Notoriety the first time you defeat certain enemies (typically any monster with a proper name), and for completing particularly difficult quests.

Anatomy_Humans.Name: Human Anatomy
Anatomy_Humans.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of humans.

Anatomy_Undead.Name: Undead Anatomy
Anatomy_Undead.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of undead, such as skeletons, zombies, and liches. This skill doesn't cover undead without bodies, such as ghosts and wraiths.

Anatomy_Incorporeal.Name: Incorporeal Creature Anatomy
Anatomy_Incorporeal.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of incorporeal creatures, such as ghosts and shadow illusions.

Goblinese.Name: Goblinese
Goblinese.Description: Fluency in the language of goblins.

Cheesemaking.Name: Cheesemaking
Cheesemaking.Description: Making cheese, butter, and other dairy products. But mostly: cheese.

Textiles.Description: The craft of turning raw ingredients into cloth. Textile creation includes cotton, wool, silk, and many other fiber types. Cloth made from animal hides (e.g. leather) comes from the Tanning skill instead.
Textiles.Name: Textile Creation

Butchering.Description: Skill in the act of removing meat and useful body organs from a corpse. You need to be carrying a Butcher Knife in order to butcher a corpse. Corpses of sentient creatures, such as goblins and humans, can't be butchered.

IocaineResistance.Name: Iocaine Resistance
IocaineResistance.Description: Practiced resistance to the deadly mushroom poison known as Iocaine. (Each point of this skill reduces the damage from Iocaine-based poisons by 1%.)

Tailoring.Description: Tailoring has two aspects: first, you use it to turn textiles into clothing. Second, you can use tailoring to make clothing and leather armor more cofortable, more useful, or more stylish.

Shield.Description: Expertise in the use of a shield, both as a weapon and as a defensive tool.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Shield, gain favor with Sir Johnson in Rahu. Wait, he's in Amulna for now.

Stoneworking.Name: Stone Working
Stoneworking.Description: The use of stone in construction and decoration.

Oratory.Name: Oratory
Oratory.Description: The ability to speak in public in a way that moves your audience.

Compassion.Description: The ability to feel empathy, even for creatures not at all like yourself.

Phrenology.Description: An understanding of how sentient creatures think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. This base skill represents your overall Phrenological prowess. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

Phrenology_Humans.Name: Human Phrenology
Phrenology_Humans.Description: An understanding of how humans think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Elves.Name: Elf Phrenology
Phrenology_Elves.Description: An understanding of how elves think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Rakshasa.Name: Rakshasa Phrenology
Phrenology_Rakshasa.Description: An understanding of how rakshasa think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Fae.Name: Fae Phrenology
Phrenology_Fae.Description: An understanding of how fairies think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Goblins.Name: Goblin Phrenology
Phrenology_Goblins.Description: An understanding of how goblins think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Orcs.Name: Orc Phrenology
Phrenology_Orcs.Description: An understanding of how orcs think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Giants.Name: Giant Phrenology
Phrenology_Giants.Description: An understanding of how humans think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Demons.Name: Demon Phrenology
Phrenology_Demons.Description: An understanding of how demons think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Aberrations.Name: Aberration Phrenology
Phrenology_Aberrations.Description: An understanding of how sentient aberrations think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Phrenology_Crones.Name: Crone-Kin Phrenology
Phrenology_Crones.Description: An understanding of how crones think and feel, based on careful study of the shape of their skulls. (Phrenology skills provide critical-hit chances to all Psychology and Mentalism attacks against the corresponding type of creature. Phrenology also has more esoteric uses.)

18.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 3%)

30.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 5%)

36.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 6%)

42.Notes: Mentalism/Psychology critical hit chance: +1% (total 7%)

Anatomy_Crones.Name: Crone-Kin Anatomy
Anatomy_Crones.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of crones and their ilk, including harpies, hags, and striga.

DyeMaking.Name: Dye Making
DyeMaking.Description:
Skill in producing dye. These dyes can be used to color armor.

This skill covers only the creation of the dye; Textile Creation, Tanning, or Blacksmithing is used to apply the dye, depending on what the armor is made of.

Hoplology.Name: Hoplology
Hoplology.Description:
The study of weapons and armor, with a focus on the benefits and weaknesses of different kinds of equipment.

As the skill increases, Staff users will find that their combat abilities also restore Armor.

Hammer.Description: Mastery of the use of hammers and clubs in combat. Power consumption is higher than average, but so is damage. Hammers excel at rapidly murdering enemies, no more and no less.

AdvancementHints.50: To earn more XP in Hammer, gain favor with Falkrin Overstrike in Rahu. Wait, he's in Amulna for now.

Anatomy_Plants.Name: Plant Anatomy
Anatomy_Plants.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of monstrous plants.

Toolcrafting.Name: Toolcrafting
Toolcrafting.Description: Skill in the creation of advanced tools and unusual equipment. Far more than just creating hand tools, an expert Toolcrafter is a master of repurposing found materials, and can create belts, armors, and even weapons from unusual materials. This equipment is usually designed to meet very specialized needs.

Artistry.Name: Artistry
Artistry.Description: Skill in the visual arts, including painting, sculpting, and mosaic creation.

Vocabulary.Name: Vocabulary
Vocabulary.Description: Knowledge of many words in the common language.

CorpseTalking.Name: Corpse Talking
CorpseTalking.Description: Ability to commune telepathically with nearby dead bodies. Higher skill grants higher chances of persuading recalcitrant spirits, as well as higher comprehension rates when learning from the dead.

TreasureCartography.Name: Treasure Cartography
TreasureCartography.Description: Experience creating maps from old clues. The maps can lead to treasure... or tragedy.

IceMagic.Name: Ice Magic
IceMagic.Description: A specialization of Fire Magic that focuses entirely upon lowering temperature instead of raising it. It has protective and controlling abilities as well as offensive abilities.

30.Notes: Access to new research recipe

Anatomy_Reptiles.Name: Reptile Anatomy
Anatomy_Reptiles.Description: Knowledge of the physiology of snakes, snake-people, and generally snakey things.

9.Notes: Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3%

18.Notes:
Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3% (total 6%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 6%)

24.Notes:
Archery chance of critical hit: +1% (total 3%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 8%)

27.Notes: Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3% (total 9%)

30.Notes:
Skinning yields a trophy skin: +1% (total 3%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 10%)

36.Notes:
Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3% (total 12%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 12%)

40.Notes:
Skinning yields a trophy skin: +1% (total 4%)
Archery chance of critical hit: +1% (total 5%)

42.Notes:
Skinning yields exotic items: +2% (total 12%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 14%)

45.Notes: Butchery yields rare meat or organs: +3% (total 15%)

48.Notes:
Archery chance of critical hit: +1% (total 6%)
Butchery yields extra bones: +2% (total 16%)

Performance.Name: Performance
Performance.Description: This umbrella skill represents your ability to entertain with performances of music, acrobatics, dance, art, recitals, and so on.

Performance_Strings.Name: Stringed Instruments
Performance_Strings.Description: Skill in performing with stringed instruments such as harps, lutes, and guitars.

Performance_Percussion.Name: Percussion Instruments
Performance_Percussion.Description: Skill in performing with percussion instruments such as drums, bells, and dulcimers.

Performance_Wind.Name: Wind Instruments
Performance_Wind.Description: Skill in performing with brass and woodwind instruments such as trumpets, ocarinas, and flutes.

ArmorAugmentBrewing.Name: Armor Augmentation
ArmorAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Chest-Armor Augments and Leg-Armor Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)

WeaponAugmentBrewing.Name: Weapon Augmentation
WeaponAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Weapon Augments, Off-Hand Augments, and Glove Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)

AncillaryArmorAugmentBrewing.Name: Ancillary-Armor Augmentation
AncillaryArmorAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Helm Augments and Shoes Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)

JewelryAugmentBrewing.Name: Jewelry Augmentation
JewelryAugmentBrewing.Description: Knowledge of the techniques for creating Necklace Augments and Ring Augments. (Augments for other types of equipment are covered by other skills.)

CivicPride.Name: Civic Pride
CivicPride.Description: Represents your willingness to tackle the small, mundane tasks in your community, and your understanding of why that's important. This skill is especially valued by humans.

Assessment.Name: Assessment
Assessment.Description: Skill in determining things about somebody based on their visible appearance. A high Assessment skill lets you see more information about other players when you examine them.

Industry.Name: Industry
Industry.Description: Competence in completing tasks to specification. Highly industrious workers can juggle more tasks at once, and earn slightly higher rewards for their hard work.

Transmutation.Name: Transmutation
Transmutation.Description: The science of permanently altering how a magical item works. Also covers manipulation of the basic materials of magic, such as phlogiston.

Augmentation.Name: Augmentation
Augmentation.Description: Skill in creating magical augments. This is an umbrella skill representing your overall knowledge of augmentation.

GiantBat.Name: Giant Bat
GiantBat.Description: Skill in living and fighting as a bat.

BuckleArtistry.Name: Buckle Artistry
BuckleArtistry.Description: Skill in creating belt buckles with symbolic meanings. Belt buckle artwork is a deeply personal expression which can give hammer warriors a morale boost in battle. However, because they are so personal, crafted belt buckles are only useful to the person who crafts them.
